review: My wife and I like our Fire Stick very much. The only qualms we may have are: there's no way to pull up a search feature from within the music, apps, etc. menus (you have to go to the search feature at the top of the sidebar), and there's no video chat feature - something Chromecast allows you to do.
author: Jeffrey Herrera

review: A little bit expensive, some apps don't work fine (Plex for example, 5$), dont support external conections. I have a Chromecast and if you have a Smartphone or Tablet the Google solution is the very best.The only reason for buy this device is "Amazon Prime Video" if you don't want "Amazon Prime Video" I dont recommend this device.
author: Oscar Navarro

review: Just love .no problems,quality is wonderful.hd quality. Streaming  is like a normal computer speed but luv d results.
author: psyche alves

review: I really love this, but I hardly ever use it since I have poor internet where I live.
author: Amazon Customer

review: I purchased this for my mother but now I will be buying one for myself because it offers me more than the apps on my TIVO. Way more entertainment options.
author: Sboadu "SBoadu"
